dt-api.name: hide()
dt-api.description:
This method detaches the DateTime from the dom and also turns off any listeners that are in place. It doesn't empty it's own container though, so it is in effect a 'weak' `de-api destroy()`.
This can be useful in cases where a container that holds the `-tag input` for the DateTime is removed from the display (e.g. a modal form). Calling this method will ensure that the date / time picker is hidden, regardless of its focus state.

example.title: Ensure the date picker is hidden when closing a Bootstrap 4 modal
